sentences.en: Clinical benefit response ( CBR ) was 66.7 % in group GEM and 12.5 % in group BSC ( P < 0. 05 ).
sentences.cn: 临床受益反应 ( CBR ) GEM组66.7%,BSC组12.5%,有统计学差异 ( P<0.05 ).

sentences.en: He beguiled me into parting with the gem.
sentences.cn: 他诱骗我把那枚宝石割爱.

sentences.en: He has the skill to ftech out the beauty of a gem by polishing.
sentences.cn: 他有手艺把一块宝石加以打磨,使它显出美丽的光泽.

sentences.en: Here is a beautiful and hard to find gem.
sentences.cn: 这是一枚非常美丽而且稀有的宝石.

sentences.en: Hsin - mei nudged Hung - chien's arm and said, " It must be ` there's a beautiful gem here.'
sentences.cn: 辛楣 拍鸿 渐 的膊子道: “ 这恐怕就是‘有美玉于斯 ’ 了. ”

sentences.en: In the ancient trade language of the Muuns, Mygeeto means gem.
sentences.cn: 在缪恩人古老的贸易语言中,麦基托的意思是珍宝.

sentences.en: Miss Famous, as she was called, was a gem.
sentences.cn: “知名小姐”人如其名，是个尤物。

sentences.en: That restaurant is a little gem.
The book is a gem of Victorian idiosyncrasy.
sentences.cn: 这本书展现了维多利亚时代特色的精华。

sentences.en: The gem is beyond my pocket.
The huge piece of rough was cut to be a superb gem of 128 carats.
sentences.cn: 那一大块未琢磨的宝石被琢成一粒128克的上等宝石.

sentences.en: The little gem is worth two thousand dollars.
sentences.cn: 这块小宝石价值两千美元.

sentences.en: This blue - white gem appears to the southwest ( lower left ) of Arcturus.
sentences.cn: 这个蓝白宝石一样的星星出现在大角星的西南方向.

sentences.en: This yacht is really a gem.
sentences.cn: 这只游艇确实精美无比.

words.tran_cn: 点缀；用宝石镶嵌；饰以宝石

trans.tran_cn: 宝石，珍宝，精华，佳作，受人重视者，[印]四点活字
trans.tran_en: a beautiful stone that has been cut into a special shape

trans.tran_cn: 点缀； 用宝石装饰； 饰以宝石
